Package control

Class PetrinetEditorController

java.lang.Object
control.PetrinetEditorController
public class PetrinetEditorController extends Object

An editor for an instance of Petrinet being linked to an implementing instance of PetrinetGraph.

    Description

      Instantiates a new editor.
      Parameters:
      petrinetViewerController - the controller for the petrinet view
      petrinetGraph - the instance implementing petrinet graph
      toolbarChangeListener - listener for change of the toolbar buttons

    • abortAddEdge

      void abortAddEdge()
      Aborts adding edge.

    • toggleAddEdge

      void toggleAddEdge(String id) throws DuplicateIdException
      Adds an edge. If already adding an edge, adding edge is aborted.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the edge to be added
      Throws:
      DuplicateIdException - thrown if id already exists

    • toggleRemoveEdge

      void toggleRemoveEdge()
      Removes an edge. If already removing an edge, removing edge is aborted.

    • addsEdge

      public boolean addsEdge()
      Checks whether editor is in the process of adding an edge.
      Returns:
      true, if in process of adding an edge

    • removesEdge

      public boolean removesEdge()
      Checks whether editor is in the process of removing an edge.
      Returns:
      true, if in process of removing an edge
